Source.Name: pulseview
Source.Summary: A Qt-based visualizer for logic analyzers, oscilloscopes and multimeters supported by sigrok.
Source.Description: The sigrok project aims at creating a portable, cross-platform, Free/Libre/Open-Source signal analysis software suite that supports various device types (such as logic analyzers, oscilloscopes, multimeters, and more). PulseView is a Qt-based LA/scope/MSO GUI for sigrok.
